sqlMap.select: select a.sno,a.user_id,a.user_name,a.user_pswd,a.msisdn,a.email, b.provinces,b.city,b.region,b.org_level, (select c.org_name from kq_region_relation c where c.org_id=b.provinces) provinces_name, (select c.org_name from kq_region_relation c where c.org_id=b.city) city_name, (select c.org_name from kq_region_relation c where c.org_id=b.region) region_name from kq_isc_user a ,kq_user_region b where a.is_valid =1 and a.sno =b.sno and a.user_id = #user_id#

select a.sno,a.user_id,a.user_name,a.user_pswd,a.msisdn,a.email, b.provinces,b.city,b.region,b.org_level from kq_isc_user a ,kq_user_region b where a.is_valid =1 and a.sno =b.sno and a.user_id = #user_id#

select distinct t3.privilege_id page_id from kq_isc_user_role t1, kq_isc_role t2, kq_isc_role_privilege t3 where t1.role_id = t2.role_id and t2.role_id = t3.role_id and (t2.sysid = #sysid# or t2.sysid = -1) and t1.sno = #sno#
